Reviews.Title: review of the phone
Reviews.Author: Andres
Reviews.Content: For the price, its a good phone. I wish the holes it has for earpiece and charging had some kind of cover. They are not covered so things can go inside. A friend tried sending me a picture but I did not receive it. Everything else works great. The size is perfect for me and is easy to text. So far I have not had any problems.I recommend the phone for basic use.

Reviews.Title: An Excellent Phone with Qwerty Keyboard
Reviews.Author: Paul "wds"
Reviews.Content: I am using the phones for the last 6 months.The good:(1) Good audio quality(2) Good Reception(3) Qwerty Keyboard(4) Easy to use(6) Bar Style(7) High Quality Camera(8) Easy to pair with BluetoothThe bad:Does not appear to be sync-friendly.Overall, it is an excellent phone for this price. I will for sure recommend this phone to friends.

Reviews.Title: Hardware Good, Software Terrible!
Reviews.Author: Gregory Brennan
Reviews.Content: I have had this phone for three and a half months.  I only have to recharge the phone once a week at most, it is comfortable to hold and easy to text.  There is no way, not one way, to sync , backup, import or export contacts and messages to a PC.  Can't do it.  It only holds about 300 messages and when it fills up you can either delete less important ones one by one or you can delete every one.  Now you can fit dozens of photos on this phone, I have no idea why they wouldn't share the storage with the software that handles the messages.Given how nice the hardware is I'm very frustrated with the lack of backup and the limited message space.

Reviews.Title: Basic phone for a Senior
Reviews.Author: Donn G.Collins
Reviews.Content: I received this phone yesterday and placed my pure talk Sim card in place and I have enjoyed the phone ever since. No it's not an I phone but it is a well built phone for talking and texting. With the raised key QWERTY text messages were easy to send. With Motorola quality and at a price just over $ 40 this phone is hard to beat. With my pure talk plan of $ 15 a month for two phones it fits right into my budget. I will repeat it is a great phone for seniors who want to stay in contact with home. Tech nerds please look elsewhere!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Text/Talk Phone
Reviews.Author: David Imerman
Reviews.Content: Great phone for the non-'smart' set.  Good reception and easy to use keypad.  MP3, FM Radio, etc. Only caveat, haven't been ablt to find a gel case in US.  Non-the-less, a great buy!

Reviews.Title: somewhat disapointed
Reviews.Author: Ray
Reviews.Content: Wanted a simple phone with a qwerty keyboard to text and send pictures.Phone has good reception,good camera but can not get it to send or rec. pictures? Also very strange ring tones.Phone arrived set up in english but if you reset to factory defaults it comes back on in spanish.

Reviews.Title: its a good phone
Reviews.Author: John McNamee
Reviews.Content: it meets my mother in-laws expectationsits a good quality phone but restricted in things it can doit is no way a smart phone

Reviews.Title: new  motorola  shipped  to  newark  DE  customer  perfer  !
Reviews.Author: john covolesky
Reviews.Content: Got  phone  to  today  shipped  on time  and  great  phone  better  reception  GSM  quad  but  having  trouble  sending  photos  by  text  learning  more  about  this motorola  priced  nice  phone  hope  to  have  a  answer  soon  on  photos  overwise  good  brand  in  cell  phone

Reviews.Title: Does the job
Reviews.Author: Romantic Warrior
Reviews.Content: I would advise to all who just need something to talk on and not for downloading apps, surfing the web or other crap.  Its a phone, not a computer so dont expect a mini computer.  When ever I go on a trip I bring this along and my Duracell Powermat in case something goes wrong, because these days you never know.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this phone
Reviews.Author: MG
Reviews.Content: Slow, battery dies quickly, not what it's billed to be. Should have avoided it and bought a real phone. Avoid this phone.
